## Queue3.removeRepeatable() method

Removes a given repeatable job. The RepeatOptions and JobId needs to be the same as the ones used for the job when it was added.

name: The name of the to be removed job

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeRepeatable(name: string, opts: RepeatOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string |  |
|  opts | [RepeatOptions](./bullmq.repeatoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
